analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol:
	Contract _0xDiaryToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol#609-610)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

_0xDiaryToken._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol#255-257)
_0xDiaryToken._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol#265-266)
_0xDiaryToken._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol#259)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/3/0x6056247d57fbf1e7d2ca01b9b2ac03a12061221b.sol#389-390:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
